Title: The communes are big, the people numerous, the natural resources abundant, it is easy to develop a diversified economy
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: Poster nr. 5 from the series "People's communes are good" (Renmin gongshe hao, 人民公社好).This poster has been cut in four and recycled for printing texts. The printed text shimmers through the very thin paper.
